title: Tennis Score Keeper - Wear
summary: The perfect way for players and spectators alike to keep track of tennis scores
developerAddress:
7007 Lachlan Circle APT L
Baltimore MD, 21239
description: Have you ever been playing a tennis match and just forget the score? Have you ever been watching a tennis match and have trouble following along because you can't keep track of the score? Well, now, with the Tennis Score Keeper for Android Wear devices, this cumbersome and embarrassing occurrence is no longer a concern! The Tennis Score Keeper is the absolute perfect way for anyone involved in a tennis match to keep track of the score. This Android Wear application is a great tool for players, parents, coaches, friends, and anyone else who wants a fool-proof way to follow the score of a tennis match.

comments: Hard to see Great app but it's hard to see in bright sunlight with sunglasses. I stopped using it during the day.
